# PrimitiveButtonStyleConfiguration.Label

**Structure**

A type-erased label of a button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Label
```

## Configuring a button’s label

- **label**: A view that describes the effect of calling the button’s action.

## Conforms To

- View

items.description: A view that describes the effect of calling the button’s action.
items.name: label
